WorkflowInfo.Name: Monitor mail service using an external address
WorkflowInfo.Description: Monitor your mail service by sending email to external alert
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:SendAyehuIM;Assembly=SendAyehuIM, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:SendSMS;Assembly=SendSMS, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="300" Subject="test mail service - send email to external alert" DestinationNumber="0" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:05:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 9.00.8112.16434"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">test mail service - send email to external 
alert </BODY></HTML>
" To="Echo@TU-Berlin.DE" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns1:ReturnValue Value="You have successfully reached " IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Contains" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Contains("&&&","You have successfully reached ")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns2:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns1:ReturnValue Value="You have successfully reached " IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Not Contains" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Not Contains("&&&","You have successfully reached ")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns3:SendAyehuIM Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="" DestinationNumber="1" DisplayName="Send eyeShare IM" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" TemplateNumber="0" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendAyehuIM" SendRN="False" x:Name="sendAyehuIM1" Timeout="00:00:00" DestinationType="User" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Send a eyeShareIM alert to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" Body="External mail service is not working" To="Admin" MessageType="Custom" /> <ns4:SendSMS Channel="SMS" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="" DestinationNumber="1" DisplayName="Send SMS" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" TemplateNumber="0" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendSMS" SendRN="False" x:Name="sendSMS1" Timeout="00:00:00" DestinationType="User" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Send SMS to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" Body="External mail service is not working" To="Admin" MessageType="Custom" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process sends a mail to an external mail address and waits for an automatic response for a pre-defined time frame. If thereÂ’s no response the Admin is alerted with SMS and IM. This process can be scheduled to run hourly to make sure your service is available.
